page.title: 01BOXFORD
page.content: The children of Boxford School conducted the Domesday Project in and around Boxford and found that the land in this area is mostly used for growing crops. Little has changed in the area over many years apart from three new housing developments in Boxford with another under construction. The area surveyed consists of the village of Boxford and small hamlets surrounding it such as Groton and Edwardstone. Boxford is a small village with a river running through it called the river Box. It has approximately 1500 inhabitants.
